title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 280.9 - Cap on tax credit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 280.9 - Cap on tax credit

State Regulations

The total amount of tax credits listed on certificates of tax
credit issued by the commissioner pursuant to this article may not exceed
$35,000,000. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
280.9

Adopted

New

York State Register December 22, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/22/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
